name: Roomescape
description:
Roomescape is an first-person, puzzle, escape game. It it is a tribute to old browser-escape-games and build in the same style, but in 3D.
#LD37 #LudumDare37



In Roomescape you have to escape from one room. To achieve this you have to solve some puzzles and crack a code,



I hope you can escape and have fun :D



Minemes
